effects: Restore 20 (+0.6x, Heal) MP split over 3 turns to all allies

desc_short: Consume caster's HP to gradually restore MP for all allies
消耗自身HP持續恢復全體隊員的MP
사용자의 HP를 소모하여 아군 전체의 MP를 서서히 회복
Consume les PV du lanceur pour restaurer progressivement les PM de tous les alliés
Verbraucht eigene LP, um MP aller Verb. aufzufüllen
Consume VIT propia para recuperar PM de todos los aliados poco a poco
desc_long: Consumes caster's HP to gradually recover MP for all allies.
消耗自身HP持續恢復全體隊員的MP。
